children.title: Everest Region
children.description: Journey towards the top of the world.

children.title: Everest Base Camp Trek 14 Days
children.description: Follow the iconic trail through Sherpa villages to the legendary base camp of Mount Everest.

children.title: Everest Panorama Trek 10 Days
children.description: A short and scenic trek offering spectacular Everest views and rich Sherpa cultural experiences.

children.title: Everest Three Pass Trek 20 Days
children.description: An adventurous high-altitude trek crossing three dramatic passes with unmatched Everest-region scenery.

children.title: EBC & Gokyo Valley Trek 18 Days
children.description: The EBC & Gokyo Valley Trek incorporates two of Nepal’s most popular trekking routes. Firstly, you will be able to trek the famous Everest Base Camp trek

children.title: Everest Base camp Trekking with Heli Return 12 Days
children.description: Everest Base Camp Trek with Helicopter Return is perfectly planned to include unbelievable scenery, places for cultural interaction

children.title: Kongde Trekking 11 Days
children.description: Introduction Trekking within the Everest region is often overlooked because of the Kongde trek's unique scenery as one walks the trail on their trek

children.title: Annapurna Region
children.description: Diverse landscapes, culture, and iconic Himalayan views.

children.title: Khopra Ridge Trekking
children.description: Khopra Danda Trek or Khopra Ridge Community Trek, is one of the least travel and least use trekking routes in Nepal.

children.title: Annapurna Base Camp Trek  8 Days
children.description: A short and scenic Himalayan trek into the Annapurna Sanctuary with panoramic mountain views.

children.title: Annapurna Circuit Trekking 14 Days
children.description: Annapurna Circuit Trek is the ultimate trek in the world; it is a well-deserved title. Opened to foreign trekkers in 1977

children.title: Poon HIll Trekking 10 Days
children.description: If you want to trek in Nepal but don’t have weeks to do it or you’re a novice looking for an easier trek in the Himalayas it’s time to look at the Poon Hill trek

children.title: Annapurna Base Camp Via Poon Hill 14 Days
children.description: The Annapurna Base Camp (ABC) trek. It is located at the base of the Himalayas and is one of the most Awesome trekking destinations in the world.

children.title: Mardi Trek 10 Days
children.description: If you like a Himalayan trek with nice mountain scenery but not too many tough, hard, difficult days in the higher hills

children.title: Siklis Trekking 11 Days
children.description: Siklis Trekking gives you the opportunity for a serene trekking experience with beautiful nature scenery and the chance to connect with local culture.

children.title: Mohore Danda Trekking 11 Days
children.description: This, also known as the Mohore Hill Trek or Eco-Community Lodge Trek.

children.title: Langtang Region
children.description: Pristine valleys, glaciers, and Tamang culture.

children.title: Langtang Gosaikunda Trek
children.description: A culturally rich trek to sacred alpine lakes with dramatic high-altitude mountain scenery.

children.title: Langtang Trekking
children.description: A classic Himalayan trek through Tamang villages, forests, and glacier-fed valleys near Tibet.

children.title: Manaslu Region
children.description: Trekking in the lap of worlds eights highest peak with cultural diversity

children.title: Manaslu Circuit Trekking 16 Days
children.description: Manaslu Circuit Trek is one of the most renowned and highly-rated treks in the world. It is located in the north-central part of Nepal’s Gorkha District

children.title: Tsum Valley Trekking 15 Days
children.description: Tsum Valley Trekking is becoming a popular trekking route located in the remote regions of the Nepalese Himalayas. It is a perfect blend of natural beauty, cultural heritage, and adventure

children.title: Manaslu Tsum Valley Trekking 22 Days
children.description: Manaslu Tsum Valley Trekking Manaslu Circuit Trek is one of the most renowned and highly-rated treks in the world

children.title: Restricted/Special Area Trekking
children.description: Special Permits (RAPs), Restricted Area Permit (RAP) from the Department of Immigration is must.

children.title: Upper Mustang Trekking 16 Days
children.description: This Trekking provides the most amazing trekking location in Nepal. This trek provides amazing views of the Dhaulagiri Himalayas, Thakali and Tibetan culture, and the Highland desert or Mini Tibet.

children.title: Nar Phu Trekking 12 Days
children.description: Nar Phu Valley is an untouched and inaccessible part of Nepal’s Annapurna, bordering on Tibet

children.title: Kanchenjunga Base Camps 25 Days
children.description: Embark on a challenging yet rewarding journey to Kanchenjunga Base Camp. Conquer rugged terrain, witness breathtaking vistas. Reaching a height of 8586m, Kanchenjunga, the world’s third-highest mountain,

children.title: Manaslu Circuit Trekking 16 Days
children.description: Manaslu Circuit Trek is one of the most renowned and highly-rated treks in the world.

children.title: Tsum Valley Trekking 15 Days
children.description: Tsum Valley Trekking is becoming a popular trekking route located in the remote regions of the Nepalese Himalayas.

children.title: Upper Dolpo Trekking 18 Days
children.description: Trek to the virgin land of western Nepal, where raw beauty meets the  row souls of the travelers

children.title: Four UNESCO World Heritage Tour
children.description: covering four major UNESCO sites of Kathmandu in one day can be the highlight of the History &  cultural diversity of Kathmandu Valley

children.title: All Seven UNESCO Sightseeing Tour
children.description: Nepal is a small country, but inside the small country there’s amazing diversity. It has ancient cities, sacred temples, and high-altitude mountain parks, so Nepal is an open museum

children.title: Helicopter rout to Everest Base Camp
children.description: The Everest Base Camp Helicopter Tour is a unique and amazing way to experience the vast size of the Himalayas

children.title: Nagarjun Hill Hiking
children.description: Nagarjuna Hill Hike: A Refreshing Day Adventure Near Kathmandu Hiking Nagarjuna Hill is one of the best short day hikes in the Kathmandu Valley

children.title: Nagarkot Sunrise & Hike to Changunarayan
children.description: Nagarkot Sunrise and Hike to Changu. This Nagarkot Hike to Changu tour begins early before sunrise start at your hotel in Kathmandu.

children.title: Kathmandu Durbar Square
children.description: Kathmandu Durbar Square is one of the Seven UNESCO World Heritage Sites of Kathmandu Valley in Nepal

children.title: Chandragiri Cable Car Ride
children.description: The best place to observe the view of Kathmandu valley, along with the view of the wide Himalayan Range.

children.title: Kathmandu Pokhara Chitwan 8 Days
children.description: Kathmandu Pokhara Chitwan Tour, or simply referred to as Nepal’s Golden Triangle, is Nepal’s gem and Nepal’s most diversified tour package.

children.title: Golden Triangle Nepal Luxuary Tour 9 Days
children.description: The Luxury Nepal Tour is an extraordinary blend of culture, nature, and luxury.

children.title: Kathmandu Exploration 3 Days
children.description: All that is Kathmandu: religion, history, and cultural iconography combine with dilapidated landmarks, madcap streets, and peaceful temples; you will have the time to marvel at such fanciful landmarks and sense some of the city's special vibe on this 3-day

children.title: Taste of Nepal(city, Jungle, Lake & Himalayas) 13 Days
children.description: City, Jungle, Lake & Himalayas is an amazing, individualized 13-day exploration of the stunning and diverse regions in Nepal. Kathmandu, Pokhara,

children.title: Mera Peak Expeditions 17 Days
children.description: Mera Peak is an exquisite mountain in the Everest region of Nepal, rising to 6476 meters above sea level. It has become one of the most frequently climbed trekking peaks in Nepal

children.title: Lobuche Peak Climbing 17 Days
children.description: Lobuche Peak (6119 m / 20075 ft) in the Everest region is one of the simpler trekking peaks in Nepal and provides climber tourists with a difficult experience and a lifelong experience

children.title: Island Peak Climbing 17 Days
children.description: Imja Tse, also known as Island Peak, is arguably the most popular climbing peak in Nepal. It is ideal for climbers with a range of experience, including their first climb

children.title: Bhutan
children.description: The last Himalayan kingdom.

children.title: Nepal Bhutan Tour 9 Days
children.description: The Bhutan Nepal Tour is very rewarding and adventurous holiday. You will enjoy the cultural history of Nepal combined with the peaceful religious temperament of Bhutan

children.title: Bhutan Tour 4Night 5 Days
children.description: Bhutan  tour is a very rewarding and adventurous holiday. You will enjoy the cultural history combined with the peaceful religious temperament of Bhutan.

children.title: Tibet
children.description: The roof of the world.

children.title: Lhasa Everest Base Camp Tour 12 Days
children.description: Situated in the center of Asia, the north end of the Himalayas offers unique culture, natural landscape, and a spirituality that presents itself in every aspect of life

children.title: Kailash Yatra Tour 13 Days
children.description: Mt. Kailash Yatra Kailash Mansarovar Yatra is amongst those very few pilgrimages in the world which are most rewarding spiritually and physically highly demanding in the same dimension
